name: Post the Headlines
description:
Post the Headlines

A mini-game about how information is distorted and how they affect us. Just a very rough idea, not yet polished

How to Play:

-Interact with the words, hover (for a short period of time) to check anticipated effects, click to confirm changes.

-Earn enough hits to avoid getting fired.

*The blinking bar shows at most how many hits you can earn, it won’t reflect your choices.

-Don't quit until you see the 'END'

//The font looks a bit different after building

Spoiler/Concept [Highlight below to check]:

Lose the game or lose the conscience
Keep your job or keep your kindness
You’ll actually get the bad ending by winning the game

Music:

Blue Dot Sessions - Picnic March
